languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, счастлив доложить, что полный ремонт {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечного"{/d} завершен! Его корпус стал намного прочнее, а истребители в ангаре прошли все циклы технолитаний и рвутся в бой!"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, счастлив доложить, что {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечный"{/d} готов пополнить вашу флотилию! Корабль немедленно отправится сопровождать ваш флагман".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, счастлив доложить, что полный ремонт {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}"Бессердечного"{/d} завершен! Его корпус стал намного прочнее, а истребители в ангаре прошли все циклы технолитаний и рвутся в бой!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is now fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"
"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I am pleased to inform you that the Heartless is ready to join your flotilla! The vessel will be immediately deployed to escort your flagship."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is now fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

languages.text: 「閣下、{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}の修理が完全に完了したことを喜んでご報告いたします！船体は大幅に強化され、技術連祷の一連の儀式が終了した後、格納庫の戦闘機は戦いでその価値を示す機会を今か今かと待ち望んでいます！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}の修理が完全に完了したことを喜んでご報告いたします！船体は大幅に強化され、技術連祷の一連の儀式が終了した後、格納庫の戦闘機は戦いでその価値を示す機会を今か今かと待ち望んでいます！」
「陛下、{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}ハートレス{/d}が艦隊に加わる準備が整ったことをご報告いたします！この船はただちに、旗艦の護衛任務に就かせます」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp'in{/d} tamamen onarıldığını bildirmekten memnuniyet duyuyorum! Gövde önemli ölçüde güçlendirildi ve tekno ilahilerle geçen tam bir döngünün ardından hangardaki savaş gemileri, çatışmada becerilerini gösterme şansını bekliyor!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp'in{/d} tamamen onarıldığını bildirmekten memnuniyet duyuyorum! Gövde önemli ölçüde güçlendirildi ve tekno ilahilerle geçen tam bir döngünün ardından hangardaki savaş gemileri, çatışmada becerilerini gösterme şansını bekliyor!"

"{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Taşkalp{/d}'in artık Filotilla'nıza katılmaya hazır olduğunu iletmekten memnuniyet duyarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Gemi, derhâl sancak geminize eşlik etmek üzere konuşlandırılacaktır."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡me alegro de poder informarle de que la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} está completamente reparada! Su casco ha sido reforzado considerablemente y, tras las tecnoletanías adecuadas, ¡los cazas de su hangar esperan la ocasión de demostrar su valía en combate!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡me alegro de poder informarle de que la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} está completamente reparada! Su casco ha sido reforzado considerablemente y, tras las tecnoletanías adecuadas, ¡los cazas de su hangar esperan la ocasión de demostrar su valía en combate!».

«Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¡me alegro de poder informarle de que la {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Desalmada{/d} está lista para unirse a su flotilla! Desplegaremos la nave inmediatamente como escolta para su nave insignia».

languages.text: “大人，我有个好消息要告诉您：{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}的修理工作已经彻底完成了！舰体得到了相当程度的加固。此外，经过此次全方位的技术更新之后，战斗机驾驶员也已经迫不及待，渴望在战斗中证明自己的价值！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，我有个好消息要告诉您：{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}的修理工作已经彻底完成了！舰体得到了相当程度的加固。此外，经过此次全方位的技术更新之后，战斗机驾驶员也已经迫不及待，渴望在战斗中证明自己的价值！”
“大人，我怀着无比喜悦的心情通知您，{d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}无心号{/d}已经准备好加入您的舰队了！我们会立刻委派这艘船护卫您的旗舰。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'ai l'honneur de vous informer que le {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Sans-Cœur{/d} est totalement réparé ! Nous avons considérablement renforcé la coque, et après un cycle complet de technolitanies, le chasseur est désormais prêt à vous prouver l'étendue de ses capacités. Il vous attend dans le hangar. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'ai l'honneur de vous informer que le {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Sans-Cœur{/d} est totalement réparé ! Nous avons considérablement renforcé la coque, et après un cycle complet de technolitanies, le chasseur est désormais prêt à vous prouver l'étendue de ses capacités. Il vous attend dans le hangar. »

« Votre Seigneurie, j'ai l'honneur de vous informer que le {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Sans-Cœur{/d} est prêt à rejoindre votre flottille ! Il va être immédiatement déployé afin d'escorter votre vaisseau amiral. »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich freue mich, Euch mitteilen zu können, dass die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} vollständig repariert ist! Ihr Rumpf wurde deutlich verstärkt und nach einem vollständigen Zyklus von Tech-Litaneien warten die Jäger in ihrem Hangar nur darauf, Euch ihren Wert im Kampf zu beweisen!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am pleased to inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} is fully repaired! Its hull has been considerably reinforced, and, after a complete cycle of tech-litanies, the fighter craft in its hangar now eagerly await the chance to show their worth in battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich freue mich, Euch mitteilen zu können, dass die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} vollständig repariert ist! Ihr Rumpf wurde deutlich verstärkt und nach einem vollständigen Zyklus von Tech-Litaneien warten die Jäger in ihrem Hangar nur darauf, Euch ihren Wert im Kampf zu beweisen!"

"Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich freue mich, Euch mitteilen zu können, dass die {d|Encyclopedia:BS_Heartless}Heartless{/d} nun bereit ist, sich Eurer Flotte anzuschließen! Sie wird Euer Flaggschiff ab sofort eskortieren."
